name: NLP Resistance Strategies
description: Defensive strategies against Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) manipulation tactics.

cards.title: Countering Conversational Traps
cards.description: Recognizing and deflecting hypnotic language and suggestive speech patterns.
cards.bulletpoints: Avoiding linguistic framing, detecting hypnotic cadence, questioning ambiguous presuppositions

cards.title: Breaking NLP Anchoring Techniques
cards.description: Disrupting NLP-based associations and conditioned responses.
cards.bulletpoints: Interfering with sensory linkage, reprogramming mental anchors, disrupting automatic compliance
